p: Bacterial strains used in this study are summarized in Table 1. S. aureus strains were grown in tryptic-soy broth (TSB; Becton Dickinson and Company, Franklin Lakes, NJ, USA). Escherichia coli was grown in Luria-Bertani medium (tryptone 10 g/l, yeast extract 5 g/l, NaCl 10 g/l, pH 7.0). Antibiotics were supplemented as required.
